grahampaige.comment: Yes. OK, I see everybody voted except Dave who says he accidentally hit enter instead of typing "Yes." All righty, so we got seven yeses zero nos and zero abstinences. The motion carries unanimously. Moving right along, we move to closed session. Do I get a motion? Moved by Mrs. Lee moved by Ms. Colson seconded by Mr. Del Caro that we go into closed session as authorized by Virginia State Code Section 2.23711A19 for discussing disciplining storing or dismissing specific pupils; interviewing prospective candidates for employment; consulting legal counsel employed or retained by the School Board regarding actual anticipated litigation pursuant to VaCodeSection8.01-288.3.
